patterns: In which city is your college?
responses: Our college is located in the city of Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu.

patterns: What's the name of your institution?
responses: The name of the college is Hindustan College of Arts and Science, often called HICAS.
Yes, our official website is www.hicas.ac.in. You can find detailed information there.
We offer a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate courses, including BSc AI & ML, BCA, B.Com, BBA, and many more across various disciplines.
I represent all departments, but this project was developed by students from the BSc Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning department.

patterns: When does college start and end?
At what time is the college open?
responses: The standard college timings are from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM, Monday through Friday.

patterns: What's the name of your principal?
Tell me the college principal name
responses: The respected Principal of our college is Dr. G. Baskaran.

patterns: How can I contact the college?
What is the college phone number?
responses: You can contact the college office at +91-422-4440555 or email us at hicas@hindusthan.net.

patterns: How do I apply for admission?
responses: Admissions are based on the guidelines of Bharathiar University. You can apply online through our official website's admission portal.
Yes, Hindustan College of Arts and Science is accredited by NAAC with an 'A+' Grade, which reflects our high academic standards.
Our college motto is 'To Make Every Man a Success'.
Yes, we have a spacious and hygienic cafeteria on campus that offers a variety of food and refreshments for students and staff.
Yes, we provide well-maintained and secure hostel facilities for both boys and girls.

patterns: What kind of dress is required?
responses: A formal dress code is mandatory on all working days to maintain a professional academic environment.
Absolutely. Our college has a dedicated placement cell that provides excellent training and support to ensure students are well-prepared for campus interviews.

patterns: Tell me where the library is
Where can I find the library?
responses: Our central library is located on the first floor of the main administrative building.

patterns: How much is the college fee?
responses: Our college follows both government-aided and self-financed fee structures depending on the course. For specific details, it is best to check the website or contact the admissions office.
